result.name: Ancestral hybridisation facilitated species diversification in the Lake Malawi cichlid fish adaptive radiation
result.description: Whole-genome sequencing variant call data of 41 haplochromine cichlid fish, aligned to the tilapia reference genome Orenil 1.1 (GCA_000188235.2), as described and analysed in Svardal et al. 2020 Molecular Biology and Evolution (DOI: 10.1093/molbev/msz294). The submitted VCF contains biallelic SNP calls. Filtering described in Svardal et al. Materials and Methods, sample metadata available in Svardal et al. Supplementary Table 1.
